00207 class AttributeSet::Descriptor
00208 {
00209 public:
00210     typedef boost::shared_ptr<Descriptor> Ptr;
00211     typedef std::map<std::string, size_t> NameToPosMap;
00212     typedef NameToPosMap::const_iterator  ConstIterator;
00213 
00214     typedef Util::NameAndType             NameAndType;
00215     typedef Util::NameAndTypeVec          NameAndTypeVec;
00216 
00218     struct Inserter {
00219         NameAndTypeVec vec;
00220         Inserter& add(const NameAndType& nameAndType) {
00221             vec.push_back(nameAndType); return *this;
00222         }
00223         Inserter& add(const Name& name, const NamePair& type) {
00224             vec.push_back(NameAndType(name, type)); return *this;
00225         }
00226         Inserter& add(const NameAndTypeVec& other) {
00227             for (NameAndTypeVec::const_iterator it = other.begin(), itEnd = other.end(); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00228                 vec.push_back(NameAndType(it->name, it->type));
00229             }
00230             return *this;
00231         }
00232     };
00233 
00235 
00236     Descriptor();
00237 
00239     static Ptr create(const NameAndTypeVec&);
00240 
00241     Ptr duplicateAppend(const NameAndType& attribute) const;
00242     Ptr duplicateAppend(const NameAndTypeVec& vec) const;
00243     Ptr duplicateDrop(const std::vector<size_t>& pos) const;
00244 
00246     size_t size() const { return mTypes.size(); }
00247 
00249     size_t memUsage() const;
00250 
00253     size_t find(const std::string& name) const;
00254 
00256     size_t rename(const std::string& fromName, const std::string& toName);
00257 
00259     const std::string& valueType(size_t pos) const;
00261     const NamePair& type(size_t pos) const;
00262 
00264     bool operator==(const Descriptor&) const;
00266     bool operator!=(const Descriptor& rhs) const { return !this->operator==(rhs); }
00267 
00269     const NameToPosMap& map() const { return mNameMap; }
00270 
00272     void appendTo(NameAndTypeVec& attrs) const;
00273 
00275     void write(std::ostream&) const;
00277     void read(std::istream&);
00278 
00279 private:
00280     size_t insert(const std::string& name, const NamePair& typeName);
00281     NameToPosMap                mNameMap;
00282     std::vector<NamePair>       mTypes;
00283 }; // class Descriptor
